column5: Luxurious 5,000 SF Mediterranean Retreat w/ Spectacular Lake Travis Views! Infinity Pool / Spa, Outdoor Grille & Firepit, 5 TV's, Foosball table, WiFi. 5 bdrms / 4.5 baths, sleeps 21 guests w/ 14 separate beds. Plus over 2,000 SF of additional terraces, balconies & courtyards. Conveniently located in the resort community of Lakeway directly across a deep-water cove from the Resort & Marina with boat ramp access to the lake and/or boat / jet ski / kayak / paddle board rentals available.
column8: Mediterranean Retreat Lake Travis Deep Water Cove
